bibl.title: The Coins from the 4th Century Churches and Christian Cemetery at Ismant el-Kharab, Ancient Kellis, Dakhleh Oasis, Egypt.
bibl.note: Over 700 AE coins have been retrieved from excavations at Ismant el-Kharab; the majority date to the fourth century. - Catalogue: A. The Small East Church; - B. The Large East Church; - C. The West Church complex; - D. The Enclosure cemetery. - Analysis: A. The Small East Church; - B. The Large East Church; - C. The West Church complex; - D. The Enclosure cemetery. - General Observations.
bibl.seg: Gillian E. Bowen, The Coins from the 4th Century Churches and Christian Cemetery at Ismant el-Kharab, Ancient Kellis, Dakhleh Oasis, Egypt.

Over 700 AE coins have been retrieved from excavations at Ismant el-Kharab; the majority date to the fourth century. - Catalogue: A. The Small East Church; - B. The Large East Church; - C. The West Church complex; - D. The Enclosure cemetery. - Analysis: A. The Small East Church; - B. The Large East Church; - C. The West Church complex; - D. The Enclosure cemetery. - General Observations.
